---
title: "github_missing_redirect_address.yml"
---

## High-level description
This YAML configuration file defines authentication settings for a system, specifically focusing on GitHub authentication. It sets up the basic structure for authentication requirements, session management, and GitHub OAuth integration.

## Symbols

### `authentication`
#### Description
The root configuration object for authentication settings.

#### Internal Logic
- Sets authentication as required
- Configures session settings
- Defines authentication methods, specifically GitHub in this case

### `authentication.required`
#### Description
A boolean flag indicating whether authentication is mandatory for the system.

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| required | boolean | Set to `true`, indicating that authentication is required |

### `authentication.session`
#### Description
Configures session-related settings for the authentication process.

#### Internal Logic
- Sets the domain for the session
- Configures the secure flag for the session

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| domain | string | The domain where the session is valid, set to "http://localhost:8080" |
| secure | boolean | Whether the session should use secure cookies, set to `false` |

### `authentication.methods.github`
#### Description
Configures GitHub as an authentication method.

#### Internal Logic
- Enables GitHub authentication
- Sets up GitHub OAuth credentials
- Defines the required OAuth scopes

#### Outputs
| Name | Type | Description |
|:-----|:-----|:------------|
| enabled | boolean | Whether GitHub authentication is enabled, set to `true` |
| client_id | string | The GitHub OAuth client ID |
| client_secret | string | The GitHub OAuth client secret |
| scopes | array of strings | The OAuth scopes requested, containing "user:email" |

## Configuration
| Option | Type | Default | Description |
|:-------|:-----|:--------|:------------|
| authentication.required | boolean | true | Whether authentication is required |
| authentication.session.domain | string | "http://localhost:8080" | The domain for the session |
| authentication.session.secure | boolean | false | Whether to use secure cookies for the session |
| authentication.methods.github.enabled | boolean | true | Whether GitHub authentication is enabled |
| authentication.methods.github.client_id | string | "client_id" | The GitHub OAuth client ID |
| authentication.methods.github.client_secret | string | "client_secret" | The GitHub OAuth client secret |
| authentication.methods.github.scopes | array of strings | ["user:email"] | The OAuth scopes requested from GitHub |

## Notes
1. The filename "github_missing_redirect_address.yml" suggests that this configuration might be missing a redirect address for GitHub OAuth. This is typically required for OAuth flows, so this configuration might be incomplete or used for testing purposes.
2. The session is configured to use an insecure connection (http) and has the secure flag set to false. This is likely for local development or testing purposes and should not be used in a production environment.
3. The GitHub client ID and client secret are placeholder values and would need to be replaced with actual credentials in a real deployment.
4. Only one authentication method (GitHub) is configured in this file, but the structure suggests that multiple methods could be supported.
